bug.author: ahalterman
bug.summary: Error creating init file locally for GPU + accuracy [spacy-nightly]
bug.description:
Creating an init file locally using the CLI and the GPU produces the following error: <denchmark-code>python -m spacy init config -p textcat -l en --optimize accuracy config_trf.cfg ℹ Generated template specific for your use case - Language: en - Pipeline: textcat - Optimize for: accuracy - Hardware: GPU - Transformer: roberta-base ✘ Config validation error textcat.model.tok2vec -> pooling field required </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>Environment spaCy version: 3.0.0rc2 Platform: Darwin-19.6.0-x86_64-i386-64bit Python version: 3.6.11 Pipelines: en_core_web_sm (3.0.0a0), en_core_web_lg (3.0.0a0), en_core_web_trf (3.0.0a0) </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Thanks for the report! This is definitely a bug - we're fixing it :-)
This should hopefully be fixed in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/pull/6371>#6371</denchmark-link> , but let us know if you run into new issues!
